name: NSPathCell
desc: The user interface of a path control object.

items.name: func mouseEntered(with: NSEvent, frame: NSRect, in: NSView)
items.desc: Displays the cell component over which the mouse is hovering.

items.name: func mouseExited(with: NSEvent, frame: NSRect, in: NSView)
items.desc: Hides the cell component over which the mouse is hovering.

items.name: var allowedTypes: [String]?
items.desc: Sets the component types allowed in the path when the cell is editable.

items.name: var placeholderAttributedString: NSAttributedString?
items.desc: Sets the value of the placeholder attributed string.

items.name: var backgroundColor: NSColor?
items.desc: Returns the current background color of the receiver.

items.name: class var pathComponentCellClass: AnyClass
items.desc: Returns the class used to create pathComponentCell objects when automatically filling up the control.

items.name: func rect(of: NSPathComponentCell, withFrame: NSRect, in: NSView) -> NSRect
items.desc: Returns the current rectangle being displayed for a given path component cell, with respect to a given frame in a given view.

items.name: func pathComponentCell(at: NSPoint, withFrame: NSRect, in: NSView) -> NSPathComponentCell?
items.desc: Returns the cell located at the given point within the given frame of the given view.

items.name: var clickedPathComponentCell: NSPathComponentCell?
items.desc: Sets the value of the path displayed by the receiver.

items.name: var pathComponentCells: [NSPathComponentCell]
items.desc: Sets the array of NSPathComponentCell objects currently being displayed.

items.name: var url: URL?
items.desc: Returns the path displayed by the receiver.

items.name: var clickedPathComponentCell: NSPathComponentCell?
items.desc: Sets the value of the path displayed by the receiver.

items.name: enum NSPathControl.Style
items.desc: NSPathStyle constants represent the different visual and behavioral styles an NSPathControl or NSPathCell object can have.
